House Tassel, Brussels, 1893: Victor Horta
Metro Stations, Paris, 1900: Hector Guimard
Parc Guëll, Barcelona, (1900 - 1914): Antonio Gaudì
Casa Mila, Barcelona, (1905 - 1910): Antonio Gaudì
Sagrada Familia, Barcelona, 1883: Antonio Gaudì
Stock Exchange, Amsterdam, (1897 - 1898): Hendrik Petrus Berlage
Glasgow School of Art, Glasgow, (1896 - 1899), (1906 - 1909): Charles Rennie Mackintosh
Willow Tea Rooms, Glasgow, 1903: Charles Rennie Mackintosh
Hill House, Helensburgh, Scotland, (1902 - 1904): Charles Rennie Mackintosh
"Majolikahaus", Vienna, (1898 - 1899): Otto Wagner
Secession Building, Vienna, (1897 - 1898): Ernst Maria Olbrich
Postal Savings Bank, Vienna, (1904 - 1906): Otto Wagner
Goldman and Salatsch Tailorshop, Vienna, (1908 - 1910): Adolf Loos
Haus Steiner, Vienna, 1910: Adolf Loos
School of Art, Weimar, 1904: Henry van de Velde
AEG Turbine Factory, Berlin, 1909: Peter Behrens
Fagus Factory, Alfeld, Germany, 1911: Walter Gropius and Adolf Meyer
Monadnock Building, Chicago, (1891 - 1893): Burnham and Root
Wainwright Building, St. Louis, (1890 - 1891): Dankmar Adler and Louis Sullivan
Guaranty Building, Buffalo, (1894 - 1895): Dankmar Adler and Louis Sullivan
Wright Home and Studio, Oak Park, IL, 1889: Frank Lloyd Wright
Ward Willits House, Highland Park, IL, 1902: Frank Lloyd Wright
Larkin Building, Buffalo, (1904 - 1906): Frank Lloyd Wright
Unity Temple, Oak Park, IL, 1906: Frank Lloyd Wright
Robie House, Chicago, 1909: Frank Lloyd Wright
Imperial Hotel, Tokyo, Japan, (1915 - 1922): Frank Lloyd Wright
Cittá Nuova, Project, 1914: Antonio Sant'Elia
Glass Pavilion, Cologne, 1914: Bruno Taut
Schröder House, Utrecht, 1924: Gerrit Rietveld
Friedrichstrasse Skyscraper, Project, 1921: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Concrete Office Building, Project, 1923: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Bauhaus, Dessau, 1926: Walter Gropius
Masters‘ houses, Dessau, Bauhaus Building, 1926: Walter Gropius, Carl Fieger, Ernst Neufert
Tugendhat House, Brno, (1928 - 1930): Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
Exhibition Pavilion, Barcelona, 1929: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe
"Cloud Hanger", Project, 1925: El Lissitzky
Tower for the III International in Moscow, Project, (1919 - 1920): Vladimir Tatlin
